entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet OpenSSL double free with Ubuntu 24.04 #109689
  • Extra calls in Asm #109688
  • Suboptimal code and possible loss of precision in `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime(long, long)` #109685
  • .NET 9 Process.Start crash due to CETCompat #109682
    Future
  • Struct field affects size of derived class #109680
  • JIT: Redundant bounds check is not eliminated #109677
    Future

Closed

  • Non-POD arguments passed incorrectly on ARM64 #106471
    10.0.0
  • Build crash using brew clang 19 on m3 #108956
  • [API Proposal]: Add FromFile method to BinaryData #106203
    Future
  • Add AssemblyLoadContext.LoadFromStream overload to populate Location and CodeBase #12822
  • Add file size constants (KB, MB, ...) #63256
    Future
  • [Feature Request] :Tensor<T> support #63124
    Future
  • Somebody please add support for BigInteger in Parallel.For #62176
    Future
  • Convert empty string to number in base throws AOORException #61036
    Future
  • FPE (Formet preservation encryption) FF1/FF3 supports in .Net #89818
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • MailAddress accepts invalid email address with consecutive dots #109690
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix BigInteger bitwise operators on certain negative numbers #109684
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use IsNative metadata to exclude native shared libs #109683
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 130.0.6723.116, windows: 131.0.6778.33 #109678
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Mention cpio and pigz in linux-requirements doc #109681
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix the condition to exclude only native shared libs #109676
    area-Setup, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #109567
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: tail merge returns with multiple statements #109670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • use collection syntax in illink #108458
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    area-System.Runtime, os-windows-nano, community-contribution
